title.narrative: PRP II GRM MTLC New Contract

description.narrative: This activity (PRP II GRM MTLC New Contract) is a component of Protracted Relief Programme - Reducing Poverty Through Improved Livelihoods ) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £38,988,935. This component benefits Zimbabwe, and works in the following sector(s): Basic drinking water supply and basic sanitation, Social Protection, Agricultural development, Food assistance. , with the following implementing partners: Palladium International Ltd (UK). The start date is 19-01-2009 and the end date is 31-08-2016.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Basic drinking water supply and basic sanitation
